data.lyric:
[ti:Is There More (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:04.67]Is There More (Explicit) - Drake
[00:05.61]Producer：Wallis Lane
[00:07.10]Drake：
[00:23.82]Only holdin' up I do is my end of the bargain
[00:26.58]Only beggin' that I do is me beggin' your pardon
[00:29.44]Only tryin' that I do is me tryin' the hardest
[00:32.11]Only problems I do are math problems with profit
[00:35.04]Only lyin' I do is lyin' out in the tropics
[00:37.96]Only cryin' I do is cryin' from laughin' 'bout it
[00:40.78]Only lackin' I can do is my lack of responses
[00:43.67]Only rest that I do is where the rest of my commas
[00:46.43]Still I rise Maya Angelou vibes
[00:48.81]When life comin' at you from all angles and sides
[00:51.74]And they don't wanna see that you smilin' from inside
[00:54.54]It really boils down to how you plan to survive
[00:57.27]Love certain ones but never get attached to 'em
[00:59.84]Give 'em nice things but what's that to 'em
[01:02.51]Especially when another girl I flew in is flickin' up in my bathroom
[01:05.95]And they recognize the bathroom
[01:07.61]All hell starts to break loose in my texts
[01:10.37]I only tell lies to who I gotta protect
[01:13.26]I would rather have you remember me how we met
[01:15.94]I would rather lose my leg than lose their respect
[01:18.75]But that'll never happen the way I'm watchin' my step
[01:21.28]That ain't what I'm 'bout
[01:22.89]I'm in control of my destiny never in doubt
[01:25.86]If I can't make it with you I'll make it without
[01:28.50]They say take the good with the bad I'll take it without
[01:31.45]Houston women I wine-and-dine and take to the house
[01:34.15]My moral compass is janky it breaks in the South
[01:37.25]Is there more to life than digits and bankin' accounts
[01:40.01]Is there more to life than sayin' I figured it out
[01:42.79]Is there more
[01:45.78]Yeah
[01:47.04]Drake：
[01:54.81]Sweeter the berry the blacker the juice
[01:56.67]The Boy is back in the booth ready to tap into truth
[02:00.70]Too many lyrics 'bout houses and loot
[02:02.87]Too many Walt Disney characters mouses and goofs
[02:05.77]I mean you know I love a challenge but challenged by who
[02:08.61]I'll let you bring a thousand recruits
[02:10.91]My peers are a talented group
[02:12.35]But even if you take all their statistics and carry the two
[02:15.52]Even if you rounded up the numbers and rounded the troops
[02:18.71]There's still nothin' they could really do
[02:20.76]It's too bad reality checks don't cover the balances due
[02:23.78]Whenever it's time to recoup
[02:26.50]Yeah soon as this album drop I'm out of the deal
[02:30.09]In the house playin' D'Angelo
[02:31.45]How does it feel
[02:32.90]I got a fear of havin' things on my mind when I die
[02:35.83]What you got time on your hands or time on your side
[02:38.76]Is there any sense in doin' these songs when I'm high
[02:41.63]Is there more to life than goin' on trips to Dubai
[02:43.87]Yachts on the 4th of July G5 soarin' the skies
[02:47.33]Is there more to life than all of these corporate ties
[02:49.58]And all of these fortunate times
[02:51.16]And all of these asses that never come in proportionate size
[02:54.47]Am I missin' somethin' that's more important to find
[02:57.10]Like healin' my soul like family time
[03:00.19]Is there more to life than just when I'm feelin' alive
[03:03.00]Is there more
[03:03.79]Nai Palm：
[03:14.46]Passion instant
[03:17.27]Sweat beads feel me
[03:20.07]Cupid's shot me
[03:22.77]My heartbeat's racing
[03:26.05]Tempt me drive me
[03:28.90]Feels so exciting
[03:31.79]Thought of highly
[03:34.62]It's yours entirely
[03:37.57]I'll be I'll be more than a lover
[03:40.75]More than a woman
[03:42.08]More than your lover for you
data.trans:
[ti:Is There More (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:04.67]//
[00:05.61]//
[00:07.10]//
[00:23.82]坚持不懈是我的底线
[00:26.58]我唯一的请求是请你再说一遍
[00:29.44]我唯一的努力就是拼尽全力
[00:32.11]我唯一的问题就是计算利润的问题
[00:35.04]我唯一的谎言是在热带餐风露宿
[00:37.96]我哭也是笑得流眼泪
[00:40.78]我唯一的缺乏就是缺乏回应
[00:43.67]我永不停息 我腰缠万贯
[00:46.43]我照样崛起 就像玛雅安吉洛写的那样
[00:48.81]当生活的重压从四面八方向你袭来
[00:51.74]他们不想看见你发自心底的微笑
[00:54.54]那真的会让你绞尽脑汁思考如何生存下去
[00:57.27]要爱一些人 但绝对不要跟他们联系太深
[00:59.84]要给他们好东西 但对他们来说 什么才是好东西
[01:02.51]尤其是当一个姑娘在我浴室拍照的时候
[01:05.95]他们一眼就看出来那是我的浴室
[01:07.61]然后我的短信里就是各种乱七八糟的糟心事了
[01:10.37]我只对想要保护的人撒谎
[01:13.26]我宁愿让你记得我们相遇时的场景
[01:15.94]我宁愿断条腿 也不愿失去他们对我的尊重
[01:18.75]但只要我小心翼翼地走下去 那些事情就绝不会发生
[01:21.28]那不是真的我
[01:22.89]我掌控着自己的命运 毋庸置疑
[01:25.86]如果不能和你一起走向成功 那我一个人也要成功
[01:28.50]他们说好的坏的都要承受 但我只接受好的
[01:31.45]休斯顿的女人 我和她们吃饭喝酒 带她们回家
[01:34.15]我的道德指南针质量不行 它已经分不清南北了
[01:37.25]生活中除了号码和银行账户 还有什么
[01:40.01]生活中除了需要解决的问题 还有什么
[01:42.79]还有什么
[01:45.78]//
[01:47.04]//
[01:54.81]果子越甜 果汁越黑
[01:56.67]这男孩回到了自己的空间 准备发掘真理
[02:00.70]太多歌词唱着房子和赃物
[02:02.87]太多迪士尼米奇老鼠和高飞狗
[02:05.77]我是说 你知道我喜欢挑战 但谁来挑战我
[02:08.61]我允许你带一千个帮手来
[02:10.91]我的同辈都是天赋异禀的人
[02:12.35]但是就算你摆出这些吓人的数字
[02:15.52]就算你召集了一大群人 组成了一个军队
[02:18.71]他们还是无能为力
[02:20.76]现实真是残酷 入不敷出
[02:23.78]何时才能收回成本
[02:26.50]等这张专辑发行了 我就不和你玩了
[02:30.09]在家里放着狄安吉罗的歌
[02:31.45]感觉如何
[02:32.90]我有点害怕自己死了脑子里还在想事情
[02:35.83]你有什么能耐 你掌握着时间 还是时间听你使唤
[02:38.76]当我兴奋的时候唱着这些歌有什么意义吗
[02:41.63]生活中除了去迪拜旅游 还有什么
[02:43.87]七月四号的游艇 湾流G500飞机冲破天际
[02:47.33]生活中除了那些关系户 还有什么
[02:49.58]这一切幸运的时光
[02:51.16]这些屁股的尺寸从来没有正常过
[02:54.47]我是不是错过了什么重要的东西
[02:57.10]比如治愈我灵魂的解药 比如家庭时光
[03:00.19]生活中除了感受自己活着的状态 还有什么
[03:03.00]还有什么
[03:03.79]//
[03:14.46]转瞬即逝的激情
[03:17.27]汗珠在我身上流淌
[03:20.07]丘比特射中了我
[03:22.77]我的心在狂跳
[03:26.05]诱惑我 控制我
[03:28.90]感觉真激动
[03:31.79]高度赞扬
[03:34.62]全都是你的
[03:37.57]我将 我将不只是情人
[03:40.75]不只是女人
[03:42.08]不只是你的情人
